018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static java.lang.System.out;
021import static java.util.Comparator.comparing;
022import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.Common.getOutputFileObject;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.Common.initHelperTaglets;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.CHAR_ZWNBSP;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.createXMLElement;
034
035import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
036import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
037import javax.lang.model.element.Name;
038import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
039import javax.tools.FileObject;
040import java.io.IOException;
041import java.util.ArrayList;
042import java.util.Collection;
043import java.util.EnumSet;
044import java.util.List;
045import java.util.Map;
046import java.util.Set;
047import java.util.TreeMap;
048import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
049import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
050
051import org.apiguardian.api.API;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.JavadocError;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLDocument;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLGraphLayout;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLTypeElement;
057import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.AutoLock;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
059import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
060import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Doclet;
061import jdk.javadoc.doclet.DocletEnvironment;
062import jdk.javadoc.doclet.DocletEnvironment.ModuleMode;
063import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet;
064
065/**
066 *  When this tag is added to the documentation of a class, a UML graph will be
067 *  created for this class and added to the document.<br>
068 *  <br>The JavaDoc generation will be serialised on this taglet.
069 *
070 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
071 *  @version $Id: UmlGraphLinkTaglet.java 840 2021-01-10 21:37:03Z tquadrat $
072 *  @since 0.1.0
073 *
074 *  @UMLGraph.link
075 */
076/*
077 * Update the version in the method init!!
078 */
079@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UmlGraphLinkTaglet.java 840 2021-01-10 21:37:03Z tquadrat $" )
080@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
081public class UmlGraphLinkTaglet implements Taglet
082{
083        /*-----------*\
084    ====** Constants **========================================================
085        \*-----------*/
086    /**
087     *  The name of this taglet: {@value}.
088     */
089    public static final String TAGLET_NAME = "UMLGraph.link";
090
091        /*------------*\
092    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
093        \*------------*/
094    /**
095     *  The doclet.
096     */
097    @SuppressWarnings( "FieldCanBeLocal" )
098    private Doclet m_Doclet;
099
100    /**
101     *  The doclet environment.
102     */
103    private DocletEnvironment m_DocletEnvironment;
104
105        /*------------------------*\
106    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
107        \*------------------------*/
108    /**
109     *  The registry for the type elements; it is used as a cache for the
110     *  already processed classes.
111     */
112    private static final Map<Name,UMLTypeElement> m_ClassRegistry;
113
114    /**
115     *  The lock that controls the processing for this taglet.
116     */
117    private static final AutoLock m_Lock;
118
119    static
120    {
121        m_ClassRegistry = new TreeMap<>( comparing( Name::toString ) );
122
123        final Lock lock = new ReentrantLock();
124        m_Lock = AutoLock.of( lock );
125    }
126
127        /*--------------*\
128    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
129        \*--------------*/
130    /**
131     *  Creates a new {@code UmlGraphLinkTaglet} instance.
132     */
133    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantNoArgConstructor" )
134    public UmlGraphLinkTaglet() { /* Just exists */ }
135
136        /*---------*\
137    ====** Methods **==========================================================
138        \*---------*/
139    /**
140     *  Determines the image file name based on the name of the given type
141     *  element. The returned value is not the fully qualified file name, just
142     *  the last part of it.<br>
143     *  <br>For the class {@code com.bar.MyClass}, this method would return the
144     *  file name {@code doc-files/MyClass.svg}.
145     *
146     *  @param  typeElement The type element.
147     *  @return The name of the image file that belongs to the given type
148     *      element.
149     */
150    private static final String determineImageFileName( final TypeElement typeElement )
151    {
152        final List<Name> names = new ArrayList<>();
153        var element = typeElement;
154        while( nonNull( element ) )
155        {
156            names.add( 0, element.getSimpleName() );
157            final var nestingKind = element.getNestingKind();
158            if( nestingKind.isNested() )
159            {
160                /*
161                 * As long as the current element is nested, the enclosing
162                 * element is a TypeElement.
163                 */
164                element = (TypeElement) element.getEnclosingElement();
165            }
166            else
167            {
168                //noinspection AssignmentToNull
169                element = null;
170            }
171        }
172        final var name = names.stream()
173            .map( Object::toString )
174            .collect( joining( "$" ) );
175        final var retValue = format( "doc-files/%s.svg", name );
176
177        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
178        return retValue;
179    }   //  determineImageFileName()
180
181    /**
182     *  {@inheritDoc}
183     */
184    @Override
185    public final Set<Location> getAllowedLocations() { return EnumSet.of( Location.TYPE ); }
186
187    /**
188     *  {@inheritDoc}
189     */
190    @Override
191    public final String getName() { return TAGLET_NAME; }
192
193    /**
194     *  Checks whether the given type element has at least one parent.<br>
195     *  <br>Interfaces that do not extend another interface are parent-less;
196     *  {@link java.lang.Object}
197     *  is the only class that does not have a parent class.
198     *
199     *  @param  typeElement The type element to examine.
200     *  @return {@code true} if the element has at least one parent,
201     *      {@code false} otherwise.
202     */
203    private final boolean hasParent( final UMLTypeElement typeElement )
204    {
205        /*
206         * The class java.lang.Object does not have a parent class.
207         */
208        var retValue = !Object.class.getName().equals( requireNonNullArgument( typeElement, "typeElement" ).getQualifiedName().toString() );
209        /*
210         * All other classes do extend java.lang.Object, so all other classes
211         * do have a parent - either Object or a specific class.
212         */
213        if( retValue && typeElement.isInterface() )
214        {
215            final var typeUtils = m_DocletEnvironment.getTypeUtils();
216            final var extendedInterfaces = typeUtils.directSupertypes( typeElement.asType() );
217            retValue = extendedInterfaces.size() > 1;
218            /*
219             * An interface with more than one direct supertype will have a
220             * parent for sure.
221             */
222            if( !retValue )
223            {
224                /*
225                 * If the only supertype of the interface is java.lang.Object,
226                 * the interface does not have a parent, per definition.
227                 */
228                final var typeMirror = extendedInterfaces.get( 0 );
229                final var element = typeUtils.asElement( typeMirror );
230                //noinspection TypeMayBeWeakened
231                if( element instanceof TypeElement parentTypeElement )
232                {
233                    retValue = parentTypeElement.getKind() != ElementKind.CLASS;
234                }
235            }
236        }
237
238        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
239        return retValue;
240    }   //  hasParent()
241
242    /**
243     *  {@inheritDoc}
244     */
245    @Override
246    public final void init( final DocletEnvironment docletEnvironment, final Doclet doclet )
247    {
248        Taglet.super.init( docletEnvironment, doclet );
249        m_Doclet = doclet;
250        m_DocletEnvironment = docletEnvironment;
251        initHelperTaglets( m_DocletEnvironment, m_Doclet );
252        final var typeUtils = m_DocletEnvironment.getTypeUtils();
253
254        //---* Fill the cache *------------------------------------------------
255        try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_Lock.lock() )
256        {
257            if( m_ClassRegistry.isEmpty() )
258            {
259                //---* Load all the included type elements *-------------------
260                m_DocletEnvironment.getIncludedElements().stream()
261                    .filter( e -> e instanceof TypeElement )
262                    .map( e -> (TypeElement) e )
263                    .map( t -> new UMLTypeElement( t, m_DocletEnvironment.isIncluded( t ), typeUtils ) )
264                    .forEach( u -> m_ClassRegistry.put( u.getQualifiedName(), u ) );
265
266                //---* Assign the children to the parents *--------------------
267                /*
268                 * We need a new collection because we will modify the cache
269                 * during this process.
270                 */
271                List.copyOf( m_ClassRegistry.values() )
272                    .forEach( this::initInheritance );
273            }
274        }
275    }   //  init()
276
277    /**
278     *  Assigns the given type element to its parents.<br>
279     *  <br>This method modifies the cache for the type elements, therefore it
280     *  requires the lock.
281     *
282     *  @param  typeElement The type element.
283     *
284     *  @see #m_ClassRegistry
285     *  @see #m_Lock
286     *  @see #retrieveParents(UMLTypeElement)
287     */
288    private final void initInheritance( final UMLTypeElement typeElement ) { retrieveParents( typeElement ); }
289
290    /**
291     *  {@inheritDoc}
292     */
293    @Override
294    public final boolean isInlineTag() { return false; }
295
296    /**
297     *  Do the layout for the graph.
298     *
299     *  @param  document    The UML document.
300     *  @param  focusClass  The class doc for the focus class.
301     *  @param  details The level of details for the UMLGraph:<ul>
302     *      <li>1: only elements should be shown that are relevant for the
303     *      API</li>
304     *      <li>2: all elements should be shown.</li></ul>
305     */
306    private final void layout( final UMLDocument document, final UMLTypeElement focusClass, final int details )
307    {
308        //---* Calculates the layout rows *------------------------------------
309        final var layout = new UMLGraphLayout( document );
310        final var noParentRow = layout.getNoParentRow();
311
312        //---* Create the symbol for the focusClass *--------------------------
313        final var focusClassSymbol = focusClass.createSymbol( layout, details, true );
314        document.addSymbol( focusClassSymbol );
315
316        //---* Add the focus class to a row *----------------------------------
317        if( hasParent( focusClass ) )
318        {
319            layout.newRow().addSymbol( focusClassSymbol );
320            layout.finishRow( true );
321        }
322        else
323        {
324            noParentRow.addSymbol( focusClassSymbol );
325        }
326
327        //---* Add the row for the direct children *---------------------------
328        var row = layout.newRow();
329        for( final var child : focusClass.getChildTypes() )
330        {
331            var symbol = child.createSymbol( layout, details, false );
332            if( document.addSymbol( symbol ) )
333            {
334                row.addSymbol( symbol );
335            }
336            else
337            {
338                //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
339                symbol = document.getSymbol( child.getQualifiedName() ).get();
340            }
341            layout.createConnector( focusClassSymbol, symbol );
342        }
343        layout.finishRow( true );
344
345        //---* Create the row for direct parents of the focus class *----------
346        var optionalRow = Lazy.use( layout::newRow );
347        try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_Lock.lock() )
348        {
349            for( final var parent : retrieveParents( focusClass ) )
350            {
351                var symbol = parent.createSymbol( layout, details, false );
352                row = hasParent( parent ) ? optionalRow.get() : noParentRow;
353                if( document.addSymbol( symbol ) )
354                {
355                    row.addSymbol( symbol );
356                }
357                else
358                {
359                    //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
360                    symbol = document.getSymbol( parent.getQualifiedName() ).get();
361                }
362                layout.createConnector( symbol, focusClassSymbol );
363            }
364            while( optionalRow.isPresent() )
365            {
366                //---* Add the row to the layout *-----------------------------
367                layout.finishRow( false );
368
369                //---* Get the current row *-----------------------------------
370                row = optionalRow.get();
371                optionalRow = Lazy.use( layout::newRow );
372
373                //---* Scan the classes for their parents *--------------------
374                final var rowContents = row.getContents();
375                for( final var currentSymbol : rowContents )
376                {
377                    final var currentClass = currentSymbol.getTypeElement();
378                    for( final var parent : retrieveParents( currentClass ) )
379                    {
380                        var parentSymbol = parent.createSymbol( layout, details, false );
381                        row = hasParent( parent ) ? optionalRow.get() : noParentRow;
382                        if( document.addSymbol( parentSymbol ) )
383                        {
384                            row.addSymbol( parentSymbol );
385                        }
386                        else
387                        {
388                            //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
389                            parentSymbol = document.getSymbol( parent.getQualifiedName() ).get();
390                        }
391                        layout.createConnector( parentSymbol, currentSymbol );
392                    }
393                }
394            }
395        }
396
397        //---* Distribute the elements in the layout *-------------------------
398        layout.distribute();
399    }   //  layout()
400
401    /**
402     *  Retrieves the direct parents for the given type.<br>
403     *  <br>As this method potentially modifies the cache, it requires the
404     *  lock.
405     *
406     *  @param  typeElement The type element.
407     *  @return The direct parents for the given type element.
408     *
409     *  @see #m_ClassRegistry
410     *  @see #m_Lock
411     */
412    private final Collection<UMLTypeElement> retrieveParents( final UMLTypeElement typeElement )
413    {
414        final var typeUtils = m_DocletEnvironment.getTypeUtils();
415
416        final Collection<UMLTypeElement> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
417
418        try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_Lock.lock() )
419        {
420            for( final var typeMirror : typeUtils.directSupertypes( typeElement.asType() ) )
421            {
422                final var element = typeUtils.asElement( typeMirror );
423                if( element instanceof TypeElement parentTypeElement )
424                {
425                    if( (typeElement.getKind() != ElementKind.INTERFACE) || (parentTypeElement.getKind() != ElementKind.CLASS) )
426                    {
427                        var parentUMLTypeElement = m_ClassRegistry.get( parentTypeElement.getQualifiedName() );
428                        if( isNull( parentUMLTypeElement ) )
429                        {
430                            parentUMLTypeElement = new UMLTypeElement( parentTypeElement, m_DocletEnvironment.isIncluded( parentTypeElement ), m_DocletEnvironment.getTypeUtils() );
431                            m_ClassRegistry.put( parentUMLTypeElement.getQualifiedName(), parentUMLTypeElement );
432                            parentUMLTypeElement.addChildType( typeElement );
433                            retrieveParents( parentUMLTypeElement );
434                        }
435                        else
436                        {
437                            parentUMLTypeElement.addChildType( typeElement );
438                        }
439
440                        retValue.add( parentUMLTypeElement );
441                    }
442                }
443            }
444        }
445
446        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
447        return retValue;
448    }   //  retrieveParent()
449
450    /**
451     *  {@inheritDoc}
452     */
453    @Override
454    public final String toString( final List<? extends DocTree> tags, final Element element )
455    {
456        var retValue = EMPTY_STRING;
457        if( element instanceof TypeElement typeElement )
458        {
459            final var qualifiedName = typeElement.getQualifiedName().toString();
460
461            //---* Get the target file object *--------------------------------
462            final var imageFileName = determineImageFileName( typeElement );
463            final FileObject imageFile;
464            try
465            {
466                imageFile = getOutputFileObject( m_DocletEnvironment, typeElement, imageFileName );
467            }
468            catch( final IOException e )
469            {
470                throw new JavadocError( format( "Problems on obtaining the output file for the UML Graph for %s", qualifiedName ), e );
471            }
472
473            //---* Create the return value *-----------------------------------
474            /*
475             * Basically, this is the image tag for the SVG file that we will
476             * create below.
477             */
478            final var caption1 = "UML Diagram";
479            final var caption2 = format( "%2$s for \"%1$s\"", qualifiedName, caption1 );
480
481            final var dtElement = createXMLElement( "dt" );
482            var spanElement = createXMLElement( "span", dtElement, caption1 )
483                .setAttribute( "class", "simpleTagLabel" );
484
485            final var ddElement = createXMLElement( "dd" );
486            final var aElement = createXMLElement( "a", ddElement )
487                .setAttribute( "class", "module-graph" )
488                .setAttribute( "href", imageFileName );
489            //noinspection MagicNumber
490            createXMLElement( "img", aElement, Character.toString( CHAR_ZWNBSP ) )
491                .setAttribute( "style", "vertical-align:top" )
492                .setAttribute( "alt", caption2 )
493                .setAttribute( "src", imageFileName )
494                .setAttribute( "width", 250 );
495            spanElement = createXMLElement( "span", aElement )
496                .setAttribute( "style", "background:white; border: solid black 2px;" );
497            createXMLElement( "h2", spanElement, caption2 );
498            createXMLElement( "img", spanElement, Character.toString( CHAR_ZWNBSP ) )
499                .setAttribute( "style", "border: solid black 1px; vertical-align:top" )
500                .setAttribute( "alt", caption2 )
501                .setAttribute( "src", imageFileName );
502
503            retValue = dtElement.toString() + ddElement.toString();
504
505            //---* Create the UML document *-----------------------------------
506            final var umlDocument = new UMLDocument();
507
508            try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_Lock.lock() )
509            {
510                final var details = m_DocletEnvironment.getModuleMode() == ModuleMode.API ? 1 : 2;
511
512                //---* Get the UML type element *------------------------------
513                var umlTypeElement = m_ClassRegistry.get( typeElement.getQualifiedName() );
514                if( isNull( umlTypeElement ) )
515                {
516                    umlTypeElement = new UMLTypeElement( typeElement, m_DocletEnvironment.isIncluded( typeElement ), m_DocletEnvironment.getTypeUtils() );
517                    m_ClassRegistry.put( typeElement.getQualifiedName(), umlTypeElement );
518                    initInheritance( umlTypeElement );
519                }
520
521                //---* Layout the image *--------------------------------------
522                layout( umlDocument, umlTypeElement, details );
523            }
524
525            //---* Write the new picture *-------------------------------------
526            out.printf( "Generating %s\n", imageFile.getName() );
527            try( final var outputStream = imageFile.openOutputStream() )
528            {
529                outputStream.write( umlDocument.toString().getBytes( UTF8 ) );
530            }
531            catch( final IOException e )
532            {
533                throw new JavadocError( format( "Problems on writing the UMLGraph for %s to %s", typeElement.getSimpleName(), imageFile.getName() ), e );
534            }
535        }
536
537        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
538        return retValue;
539    }   //  toString()
540}
541//  class UmlGraphLinkTaglet
542
543/*
544 *  End of File
